lead_paragraph: The president delivered a call for racial justice after two black men were killed by the police, only to face the cameras hours later to denounce the killings of five officers.

byline.contributor: Mark Landler reported from Warsaw, and Michael D. Shear from Washington.
byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

headline.print_headline: Obama Grapples for Balance After Word of Dallas Killings
headline.main: Obama’s Delicate Balance on Issue of Race and Policing

snippet: The president delivered a call for racial justice after two black men were killed by the police, only to face the cameras hours later to denounce the killings of five officers....

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
